attributes.action: Make MP's that want Trident pay for it
attributes.background:
MP's have voted for the renewal of Trident at an estimated cost of £130 Billion of YOUR MONEY.
If austerity isn't a lie, how can we as a country afford this?
If they want it, they should pay for it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125291
